post:
We are happy to announce the return of our **REAL** New York line, this isn't Buffalo or NJ. We are actively working on an auto deployment & server management panel as well, so lots of nice things coming in the future :)

Have a great and safe weekend guys!

**Enterprise Network**

Don't miss out on our premium network blend including Level 3, Telia Sonera, NTT, GTT, Cogent, Zayo, HE, and Eonix Communications.

Feel free to test our network! Here is our [Dallas Looking Glass](dal.lg.ssdblaze.com) & [NYC Looking Glass](nyc.lg.ssdblaze.com).

New York City IP: 104.140.200.255

**Support**

You always have a way of getting help. Whether its LiveChat, Ticket, Phone, Email, or even Skype. We also have routine checkups to ensure you are happy with your server!

What are you waiting for? Contact us!
